  2. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says he was 'totally wrong' about antisemitism  Business Insider
  3. 'It Is So F---ed': OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Regrets Downplaying Antisemitism 'on the American Left'  The Messenger
  4. OpenAI's Altman says he was wrong to call antisemitism overblown  The Times of Israel
  5. Sam Altman and Bill Ackman both think antisemitism is a left-wing problem  Business Insider
